text: Demoni is a Canadian-Bulgarian animated short film, directed by Theodore Ushev and released in 2012.Noel Murray, "Two inventive animated shorts draw on the traditions of Eastern Europe". The Dissolve, November 2, 2013. A music video for the song of the same name by Bulgarian musician Kottarashky, the film depicts scenes of Eastern European folk art on a spinning vinyl record. The film was a Canadian Screen Award nominee for Best Animated Short Film at the 1st Canadian Screen Awards."NFB Scores 14 Canadian Screen Award Nominations". title: Demoni (2012 film)
